transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Namaste sir, kaise hain aap?
Customer: Ramesh sir baat kar rahe hain Rani Pipe Industry se?
Executive: Haan, baat kar raha hoon bolo.
Customer: Sir, good evening. Main Juhi baat kar rahi thi IndiaMART ke office se.
Executive: Haan, boliye madam.
Customer: Aapka sir ek concern open hua tha. Aap IndiaMART helpline number pe call kar rahe the abhi services se related kuch aaye the.
Customer: Mere ko service nahi madam. Woh kya hai lead aaya tha. Lead ke andar aapka number hai. Woh kya tha madam?
Executive: Ji?
Customer: Ek lead aaya tha. 4 inch 100 mm pipe ka aur lead aaya tha mail pe. Woh mail ke andar aapka number hai IndiaMART ka helping number hai usme sir.
Executive: Us lead ke andar IndiaMART ka number tha?
Customer: Hmm. Main call kara toh IndiaMART pe chala gaya woh. Woh kya bhi ho raha hai. Itne bhi lead ho rahe hain logon ko search karne mein dikkat ho rahi hai kya ki ek jo ek cheez se search karte hain madam hamare pipe ko search kare woh lead sara call kar rahe hain. Aksar lead kharab the. Ek mein ek do mahine se aise hi ho raha hai pure.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Pure irrelevant lead sare mere ko. Tang ho gaya madam call se. Hmm. Aap sir deal kahan karte hain? Jo bhi lead sare aap check kar sakte hain. Kidhar kidhar se bhi aa rahe lead aa rahe hain.
Executive: Nahi, aap deal kahan karte hain? Aap all India karte hain ya kuch limited location?
Customer: Only Telangana madam. Only Telangana.
Executive: Only Telangana. Actually main dekh rahi thi abhi ek lead aapne consume ki thi aaj RCC pipes ki. Buyer ka name tha Balaji Dage karke Hyderabad ki.
Customer: Na unko nahi hone ka tha madam. Actually dusre pipe koi agar yeh pipe lagaya karte hain madam.
Executive: Haan. Aur ek sex and cement pipe for drainage Manak naam se dikhti hai Hyderabad se.
Customer: Haan woh wohi se baat kar raha tha main. Baat kar raha tha unhone dusre mere ko kya bolte mitti ke pipe hai na woh pipe bol rahe hain. Drainage ke liye cement pipe ko bolne ke liye search karne mein kya hai ki office ke kyun lagaya bolte hain. Kyunki main bol sakte hain na woh log. Theek hai bolke rakh diya. Ek do pipe ke waaste wahan mere se call kara.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Hmm. Woh aisa madam.
Executive: Okay sir, toh iske alawa main lead ke liye. Mere andar kam se kam main last lead kab consume kara bolte mere ko kam se kam ek che mahine ho gaya madam. Ab tak ek single lead bhi nahi purchase yeh nahi kara aur nahi hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Abhi abhi thodi der pehle abhi abhi call kare toh aapka number nikla uske andar.
Executive: Achcha. Ab aapko screenshot bhejaun kya aapko yeh number aapko mere mail pe hai?
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Hmm. Haan, ek baar aap de payenge kya mujhe screenshot?
Customer: Ek minute line pe rahega madam number aapko bolta hoon aap likh lijiye mail pe aap mera number likh aap mera number lijiye us number pe aap mujhe kar dijiye.
Customer: Ek ek second.
Executive: Haan ji. Didi number boliye ji.
Customer: 79
Customer: 79
Customer: 822
Customer: 822
Customer: 54
Customer: 54
Customer: 760
Customer: Aapka number 79 Juhi naam hai sir mera.
Executive: Okay IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hoon main.
Executive: Ek minute.
Executive: Okay madam 7982254760.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji yeh mera number hai.
Customer: Okay madam. Main aapko message karta hoon yeh do number abhi screenshot diya toh aapko.
Executive: Theek hai. Haan aap mujhe dijiye.
Customer: Theek hai madam, thank you.
Executive: Hmm.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received IndiaMART's number in a lead.

- Dissatisfied with irrelevant leads.

- Hasn't consumed a lead in six months.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to share a screenshot of the lead.

- Customer shared their number to receive the screenshot.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send a screenshot to the executive.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, irrelevant leads, screenshot
